events.comment:
This is a very simple minigame: There are 4 directions and only one is correct. You need to go to the direction from which the music comes from.

Sounds have their own "3D sounds coordinate systems". You need to change the scale of it as the normal positions would make the sounds too far away to hear. 
Here, the sound position is a number from 0 to 8, which allows us to set the player sound position to it's position divided by 100 as the resolution is 800x800.
Don't restart the sound when only resetting the scene.
Select a number from 1 to 4, 1 = Left 2 = Top 3 = Right 4 = Bottom. Depending on the selected direction, positionate the sound accordingly.
Update the player position in the sound coordinate system
